comments:
XMLFactoryImpl uses base class (EFactoryImpl) methods for converting and creating DOM elements to/from strings. This cause exception when try to deserialize concrete XSD model from XMI.
Below is exception generated by "Sample Reflective Ecore Model Editor" on attempt to load XMI model generated by serializing XSD model into XMI (XMI file attached):
ava.lang.IllegalArgumentException: The value '[xs:schema: null]' is invalid. 
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.impl.EFactoryImpl.createFromString(EFactoryImpl.java:420)

Created an attachment (id=54972)
XSD model serialized to XMI

Support for serializing XSDs as XMI has not been implemented and unless resource is donated toward that effort it's not likely to get implemented any time soon.  It's certainly not as simple as supporting createFromString/convertToString for the DOM elements; that data type should be marked as not serializeable and should fail with an exception to that affect.

I'll change this into a feature request for supporting XMI serialization of XSD instances.
